statusLine.command: input=$(cat); current_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); model_name=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); cd "$current_dir" 2>/dev/null && branch=$(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null) && printf "$(whoami)@$(hostname -s):$(basename "$current_dir")${branch:+ ($branch)} [$model_name]" || printf "$(whoami)@$(hostname -s):$(basename "$current_dir") [$model_name]"
